column4: Is it normal that if I do "gcc myprogram.c -lzmq -lczmq" it complains about a bunch of references, but if I do "gcc -lzmq -lczmq myprogram.c" it works?
I can't join ##c though and I can't send to #gcc
how do I make my ubuntu box do identd? I'm behind a firewall
Register yourself a NickServ user account. Type: /msg NickServ register myPasswordHere       My@email.here.com
